MIN: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be at least {constraints.0}
MAX: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be less than {constraints.0}
MIN_LENGTH: {property} must be longer than or equal to {constraints.0} characters
MAX_LENGTH: {property}  must be shorter than or equal to {constraints.0} characters
IS_ENUM: {property} must be one of the following values: {possibleValues}
IS_DEFINED: {property} should not be null or undefined
